goal:
Product Law Firm assists companies that manufacture and sell products in the following sectors: food, consumers goods, health and beauty, chemical products, packaging.

We provide specific legal and regulatory support, throughout the entire lifecycle of products.

Our main activities are:
- All round regulatory advice
- Crisis management
- Market access issues
- Authorization and evaluation of new products
- Institutional affairs
- Defective products and criminal litigation
- EU litigation
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Consumer Affairs, Customs, Environment, Food Safety, General and Institutional Affairs, Internal Market, Public Health
